metadata.title: CVE-2020-13309 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab versions before 13.1.10, 13.2.8and 13.3.4. GitLab was vulnerable to a blind SSRF attack through therepository mirroring feature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
